info.title: In the mayor ' s office, they described plans to renovate the CRT projects.
Vilfand warned us about snow, warming and winds.
Rakhova reported on the launch of the II laboratory project
Ethimov announced a new product to finance redevelopment projects
In the mayor ' s office, plans to increase the construction of renovative housing were reported.
Rakhova told me about the year of the first medical flag of Moscow.
In Moscow, the parking area has been expanded
Synoptic reported that a warm atmospheric front was approaching Moscow.
At the Mayor ' s office, a progress report was made on the renovation of the Vladikino electric depo
Rakhova reported that 500,000 Moscow personal videos were sent from a doctor.
